languages.text: "Ты..." {n}Муаран удивленно склоняет голову.{/n} "Позволь же мне узреть истину, что открылась твоему взору". {n}Провидец делает шаг навстречу Ирлиэт, одной рукой легко касается ее лба, а второй — чуть сияющего камня душ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ты..." {n}Муаран удивленно склоняет голову.{/n} "Позволь же мне узреть истину, что открылась твоему взору". {n}Провидец делает шаг навстречу Ирлиэт, одной рукой легко касается ее лба, а второй — чуть сияющего камня душ.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты..." {n}Муаран удивленно склоняет голову.{/n} "Позволь же мне узреть истину, что открылась твоему взору". {n}Провидец делает шаг навстречу Ирлиэт, одной рукой легко касается ее лба, а второй — чуть сияющего камня душ.{/n}

traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: “你……”{n}穆兰低下了头，惊讶不已。{/n}“让我看看你的双眼看到的真相吧。”{n}先知走向伊莉耶特，一只手轻轻触摸着她的额头，另一只手触摸着微微发光的灵魂石。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你……”{n}穆兰低下了头，惊讶不已。{/n}“让我看看你的双眼看到的真相吧。”{n}先知走向伊莉耶特，一只手轻轻触摸着她的额头，另一只手触摸着微微发光的灵魂石。{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "Ihr ..." {n}Muaran neigt überrascht den Kopf.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Wahrheit zu sehen, die Euren Augen offenbart wurde." {n}Der Runenprophet tritt vor Yrliet. Er berührt ihre Stirn leicht mit einer Hand, den schwach glimmenden Seelenstein mit der anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ..." {n}Muaran neigt überrascht den Kopf.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Wahrheit zu sehen, die Euren Augen offenbart wurde." {n}Der Runenprophet tritt vor Yrliet. Er berührt ihre Stirn leicht mit einer Hand, den schwach glimmenden Seelenstein mit der anderen.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: «Tú...». {n}Muaran inclina la cabeza, sorprendido.{/n} «Permíteme contemplar la verdad que te ha sido revelada». {n}El vidente da un paso hacia Yrliet. Toca suavemente su frente con una mano y su resplandeciente joya espiritual con la otra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tú...». {n}Muaran inclina la cabeza, sorprendido.{/n} «Permíteme contemplar la verdad que te ha sido revelada». {n}El vidente da un paso hacia Yrliet. Toca suavemente su frente con una mano y su resplandeciente joya espiritual con la otra.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: « Vous... » {n}Surpris, Muaran incline la tête.{/n} « Permettez-moi de voir la vérité qui vous a été révélée. » {n}Le Grand Prophète approche d'Yrliet. D'une main, il lui effleure le front, tout en touchant de l'autre la pierre-esprit qui luit faiblement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous... » {n}Surpris, Muaran incline la tête.{/n} « Permettez-moi de voir la vérité qui vous a été révélée. » {n}Le Grand Prophète approche d'Yrliet. D'une main, il lui effleure le front, tout en touchant de l'autre la pierre-esprit qui luit faiblement.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: 「あなたは…」{n}ムアランは驚いて頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたの目に明らかになった真実を私に見せてくれないか」{n}先見司はユリエットの前に出ると、片方の手で彼女の眉間に軽く触れ、もう片方の手でかすかに光る魂縛石に触れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは…」{n}ムアランは驚いて頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたの目に明らかになった真実を私に見せてくれないか」{n}先見司はユリエットの前に出ると、片方の手で彼女の眉間に軽く触れ、もう片方の手でかすかに光る魂縛石に触れる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "Sen..." {n}Muaran, şaşkınlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Müsaade et, senin gözlerinden hakikati göreyim." {n}Ötesezen, Yrliet'e bir adım atıyor. Bir eliyle hafifçe onun alnına, diğer eliyle de hafifçe parlayan ruh taşına dokunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}Muaran bows his head, surprised.{/n} "Allow me to see the truth that was revealed to your eyes." {n}The Farseer steps toward Yrliet. He touches her brow lightly with one hand and the faintly glowing spirit stone with the other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sen..." {n}Muaran şaşkınlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Müsaade et, senin gözlerinden hakikati göreyim." {n}Ötesezen, Yrliet'e bir adım atıyor. Bir eliyle hafifçe onun alnına, diğer eliyle de hafifçe parlayan ruh taşına dokunuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran
